title: Zoe’s jollof
description: This filling, flavoursome chicken and rice dish is a West-African speciality. Fried plantains make an authentic garnish.
ingredients: 1 Scotch bonnet chilli, de-seeded, finely chopped
1 tbsp fresh or dried thyme leaves
2 tbsp crayfish powder (available from online specialists)
6 Guinea peppers (also known as grains of paradise), crushed
4 tbsp peanut oil or sunflower oil
300g/10½oz long-grain white rice, washed and drained
handful chopped fresh parsley and coriander, to garnish
